data.title: 3 Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Next 50 Years.
data.text: Adding these top stocks to long-haul portfolios now could be profit friendly.

data.title: Waymo urges U.S. to 'promptly' remove barriers to self-driving cars
data.text: Waymo, the self-driving car unit of Google parent Alphabet Inc, on Thursday urged the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) to "promptly" remove regulatory barriers for cars without steering wheels and brake pedals.

data.title: Google’s top lawyer accused of repeated romances with underlings
data.text: Google’s top lawyer routinely ignored company rules regarding dalliances with underlings — and pointed to the lecherous ways of top Googler Eric Schmidt to justify his philandering, an explosive new blog post alleges. David Drummond, chief legal officer of Google’s parent company Alphabet, dabbled in numerous office romances, according to a former underling, who dished.

data.title: 7 Mega-Cap Tech Stocks on a Rebound Now
data.text: These mega-cap stocks are famous names in the tech world. All of them are currently well-positioned, making them names to watch in the coming weeks.

data.title: Market is focused on individual stocks, not broader tech sector: Portfolio manager
data.text: Brook Dane of Goldman Sachs Asset Management, joins CNBC's "Fast Money Halftime Report" team to discuss how the market is trading tech stocks and what he's watching.

data.title: Google to pay security researchers who find Android apps and Chrome extensions misusing user data
data.text: Google said it will pay security researchers who find “verifiably and unambiguous evidence” of data abuse using its platforms. It’s part of the company’s efforts to catch those who misuse user data collected through Android apps or Chrome extensions — and to avoid its own version of a scandal like Cambridge Analytica, which saw millions […]

data.title: Alphabet Roundup: Hong Kong, News Competitor, Waymo, Privacy, Kids, Assistant
data.text: Alphabet has been busy thwarting the Hong Kong influence campaign, opening up Waymo data for licensing, suggesting privacy standards, dealing with kids and outdoing other personal assistants.

data.title: Tech Taking Personal Healthcare by Storm: Stocks in Focus
data.text: Personal healthcare market is booming on expanding initiatives by tech giants like Apple (AAPL), Fitbit (FIT) and Alphabet (GOOGL), to name a few.

data.title: Huawei Mate 30 phone blocked from using Google apps
data.text: US trade ban means flagship phone will be launched without Google Maps or Gmail

data.title: 3 Reasons Why Analysts Are so Bullish on Alphabet Stock
data.text: There’s a reason why analysts are so bullish when it comes to Alphabet stock. The company’s shares have done well in 2019 and are currently up 12% year over year.
